info.title: Bitcoin
info.content: The world’s first cryptocurrency, Bitcoin is stored and exchanged securely on the internet through a digital ledger known as a blockchain. Bitcoins are divisible into smaller units known as satoshis — each satoshi is worth 0.00000001 bitcoin.

articles.title: As Bitcoin Surges 15%, Here's What Wall Street's Saying About The Cryptocurrency's Meteoric Resurgence
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Not everyone's a fan, but some big investors see real potential in bitcoin's role in their portfolios.

articles.title: JP Morgan's Jamie Dimon: Bitcoin Still 'Not My Cup of Tea'
articles.author: Decrypt
articles.summary: At a remote New York Times summit, JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon said he’s still not interested in Bitcoin.

articles.title: Novogratz Says Bitcoin is Digital Gold, Not a Currency for Now
articles.author: Bloomberg
articles.summary: Billionaire investor Mike Novogratz is doubling down on a call Bitcoin serves as digital gold.
